B

Ball - Class in FX.Model.Entities.Ball
this is an abstract class which is used for the rubber ball implementation.
Ball(Point2D, int, Color, Color) - Constructor for class FX.Model.Entities.Ball.Ball
this is the constructor used to create a ball object.
ballBottomCollision() - Method in class FX.Model.Entities.Ball.Ball
this method is used to change the direction of the ball to another direction on the y-axis with an increment, decrement or maintain of speed if it is being collided on the bottom side of the ball.
BallClone - Class in FX.Model.Entities.Ball
this class is an addition which creates a clone ball to increase the game enjoyability.
BallClone(Point2D) - Constructor for class FX.Model.Entities.Ball.BallClone
this constructor is used to create a ball clone which is going to be used in the game.
ballCollisionRandomSound(AudioClip, AudioClip) - Method in class FX.Model.SoundEffects
this method is used to play a random sound effect when there is a collision from the ball.
ballLeftCollision() - Method in class FX.Model.Entities.Ball.Ball
this method is used to change the direction of the ball to another direction on the x-axis with an increment, decrement or maintain of speed if it is being collided on the left side of the ball.
ballRightCollision() - Method in class FX.Model.Entities.Ball.Ball
this method is used to change the direction of the ball to another direction on the x-axis with an increment, decrement or maintain of speed if it is being collided on the right side of the ball.
ballTopCollision() - Method in class FX.Model.Entities.Ball.Ball
this method is used to change the direction of the ball to another direction on the y-axis with an increment, decrement or maintain of speed if it is being collided on the top side of the ball.
Brick - Class in FX.Model.Entities.Brick
This class is an abstract class which is going to be used for implementation.
Brick(Point2D, Dimension2D, Color, Color, int, double, String) - Constructor for class FX.Model.Entities.Brick.Brick
this method is used to create a brick object.
BrickDestroyer - Class in FX
this class is used to start the game with the main menu.
BrickDestroyer() - Constructor for class FX.BrickDestroyer
 
BrickFactory - Class in FX.Model.Entities.Brick
this class is used to return the brick object used on the wall levels.
BrickFactory() - Constructor for class FX.Model.Entities.Brick.BrickFactory
 
brickTypes - Static variable in class FX.Model.Entities.Brick.BrickFactory
this is returns an array of bricks which is used to be ease of expandability when a new brick is added.
